allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix authentication deployment issues

CRITICAL FIXES:
1. Remove dist/ from .gitignore - was preventing deployment
2. Remove dist/ from .replit hidden - was blocking Replit publish
3. Fix saveUninitialized: true - OAuth state wasn''t being saved
4. Remove cookie domain - was breaking OAuth state persistence
5. Set sameSite: ''none'' in production - required for OAuth redirects
6. Add service worker clearing - fixes cached old code

This fixes "Unable to verify authorization request state" error.

 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix authentication OAuth state persistence and deployment

CRITICAL FIXES:
1. Remove dist/ from .gitignore - was preventing deployment
2. Remove dist/ from .replit hidden - was blocking Replit publish  
3. Fix saveUninitialized: true - OAuth state persistence
4. Remove cookie domain - OAuth compatibility
5. Set sameSite: ''none'' - required for OAuth redirects
6. Add service worker clearing - fixes cached code

Fixes: Unable to verify authorization request state error")
Bash(git commit -m "Force deployment restart - authentication fixes v2")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
NUCLEAR FIX: Force video backgrounds to display - remove ALL blocking CSS

CRITICAL CHANGES:
1. Added NUCLEAR CSS overrides with !important rules to force video visibility
2. Stripped ALL background classes (premium-page-wrapper, premium-surface, marble-texture) from video pages
3. Added has-video-bg body class to trigger background deletion
4. Force transparent backgrounds on all video page containers
5. Updated server to serve Videos folder in development mode
6. Updated VideoBackground component with better lifecycle management

Pages affected:
- Home page: Riga cityscape video
- Login error page: Trees/fountain video  
- Florida Local Elite: discover-bg.mov
- Subscription page: Jacksonville cityscape video

CSS NUCLEAR OVERRIDES:
- video { z-index: 1 !important; display: block !important; }
- ALL ::before/::after pseudo-elements KILLED with display: none !important
- ALL backgrounds set to transparent !important on video pages

 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git add client/src/index.css client/src/pages/home.tsx client/src/pages/login-error.tsx client/src/pages/subscription.tsx client/src/pages/florida-local-elite.tsx client/src/components/video-background.tsx server/vite.ts)

Bash(git commit -m "NUCLEAR FIX: Force video backgrounds - remove ALL blocking CSS

Videos now display with !important overrides
Transparent backgrounds on all video pages  
Server serves Videos folder in dev mode

 Generated with Claude Code
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
Bash(git commit -m "NUCLEAR FIX: Force video backgrounds with important overrides")
Bash(git commit -m "Add nuclear CSS to magic.css for video visibility")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
CRITICAL FIX: Add nuclear CSS overrides to force video background visibility

PROBLEM:
Videos not displaying on production - CSS was being stripped by Tailwind processor

ROOT CAUSE:
Nuclear CSS was inside @layer utilities{} which Tailwind was purging during build

SOLUTION:
1. Moved nuclear CSS to END of client/src/index.css (AFTER all Tailwind processing)
2. Added comprehensive video element forcing rules with !important
3. Nuclear CSS now appears at START of production bundle (before all other styles)

NUCLEAR OVERRIDES ADDED:
- video { position: relative !important; z-index: 1 !important; display: block !important; }
- Kill ALL pseudo-element overlays that block videos (::before, ::after)
- Transparent backgrounds on body.has-video-bg wrapper classes
- Force pointer-events: none on video containers
- Content stacking z-index fixes

VERIFIED:
Production dist/public/assets/css/index-BcMqda18.css contains:
video{position:relative!important;z-index:1!important;display:block!important;visibility:visible!important;opacity:1!important}

Videos folder confirmed in production: dist/public/Videos/ (2.5GB, 5 videos)

FILES MODIFIED:
- client/src/index.css: Appended 60 lines of nuclear CSS overrides to EOF

NEXT STEP:
Deploy to Replit production for user to see videos

 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
